scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:production: npm run build && wrangler deploy --env production
scripts.build:dev: npm run build && wrangler deploy --env development
scripts.build:ci: npm run clean && npm run build:assets && npm run build:docs
scripts.deploy:unified: echo 'Use GitHub Actions workflow for unified deployment'
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.setup: copy backend\.env.example backend\.env && npm install && cd backend && npm install
scripts.pretest: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules node scripts/ensure-docs.cjs || echo 'Skipping docs check'
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.validate:build: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(!fs.existsSync('dist/index.html')){console.error('Build validation failed: index.html not found');process.exit(1);}console.log('Build validation passed');"
